about_the_game:
The "Skins Extension Pack" are extensions that will expand the skins of the characters that you can use in the game.

Each Skin Extension Pack contains a limited amount of skins available that can be used and are associated with different characters in a variety of ways.

Read in-game which Skin Extension pack is required to unlock the desired character skin.

Note: The Skin Extension Pack will not offer additional benefits or improvements to the characters. They are purely visual and only change the character designs.

By acquiring this pack you are supporting the project to continue growing!

You can buy all the Skin Extension Pack in a bundle to get a better price.

name: Path of Ascension - Skins Extension Pack III
